data.eml:eml: Identity of the coral-associated pontoniine shrimp species, Coralliocaris nudirostris (Heller, 1861) and C. venusta Kemp, 1922 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae), with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mitsuhashi, Masako, Takeda, Masatsune (2008): Identity of the coral-associated pontoniine shrimp species, Coralliocaris nudirostris (Heller, 1861) and C. venusta Kemp, 1922 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae), with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 1703: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180835
